/**
 * KRISHI-AI Main App Component
 */import React,{Suspense,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{BrowserRouter,Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';// Pages
import Landing from'./pages/Landing';import ProfileWizard from'./pages/ProfileWizard';import SchemeResults from'./pages/SchemeResults';import SchemeDetail from'./pages/SchemeDetail';import DocumentUpload from'./pages/DocumentUpload';import ApplicationForm from'./pages/ApplicationForm';import ApplicationStatus from'./pages/ApplicationStatus';import Help from'./pages/Help';import Login from'./pages/Login';import AdminDashboard from'./pages/AdminDashboard';// Components
import Header from'./components/Header';import OfflineBanner from'./components/OfflineBanner';import LoadingSpinner from'./components/LoadingSpinner';// Contexts

import'./index.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const{i18n}=useTranslation();const[highContrast,setHighContrast]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{// Check for saved preferences
const savedLang=localStorage.getItem('krishi-lang');if(savedLang){i18n.changeLanguage(savedLang);}const savedContrast=localStorage.getItem('krishi-high-contrast');if(savedContrast==='true'){setHighContrast(true);}},[i18n]);const toggleHighContrast=()=>{const newValue=!highContrast;setHighContrast(newValue);localStorage.setItem('krishi-high-contrast',String(newValue));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OfflineProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrowserRouter,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50 ".concat(highContrast?'high-contrast':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{onToggleContrast:toggleHighContrast,highContrast:highContrast}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OfflineBanner,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"pb-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Suspense,{fallback:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingSpinner,{}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Landing,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/profile",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileWizard,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/schemes",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SchemeResults,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/schemes/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SchemeDetail,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/documents",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DocumentUpload,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/apply/:schemeId",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApplicationForm,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/status/:applicationId",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApplicationStatus,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/admin",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminDashboard,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/help",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Help,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/",replace:true})})]})})})]})})})});}export default App;
